title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-5.1 - Applicability and construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-5.1 - Applicability and construction

State Regulations

This Subpart shall apply to releases of water from the

East Sidney Lake to Ouleout Creek, Sleepy Hollow Lake to Murderers Creek, Cooper Lake to an unnamed tributary to Saw Kill, and Sturgeon Pool to the

Wallkill River. Except as otherwise specifically stated herein, this Subpart
shall be construed in a manner consistent with Subpart 672-1 of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
672-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
